alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 12:51PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Franklin and east central St. Lawrence Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Ozonia, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Ozonia, Madawaska, Dickinson, Santa Clara, St. Regis Falls, Azure Mountain, and Dickinson Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin
